assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
I'm a webmaster who tryes to get people to Firefox. My web design was Firefox based, but after installing Firefox 4.0 my site's accordions stop working. ¿What can I do? ¿Tell my clients to change to IE? Obviously not. I'd prefer to keep using Mozilla Firefox, the best.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open http://www.itchihuahuaii.edu.mx/Informacion/Departamentos/ 2. Try to open one pane 3. ¡Nothing happens! Actual Results: 1. Open http://www.itchihuahuaii.edu.mx/Informacion/Departamentos/ 2. Try to open one pane 3. ¡Nothing happens!
Expected Results: No panes open.
Default theme.

Please see the following errors from the error console:
Error: Sys.ArgumentTypeException: Object of type 'Sys.Extended.UI.AccordionBehavior' cannot be converted to type 'Sys.IDisposable'. Parameter name: object Source File: http://www.itchihuahuaii.edu.mx/ScriptResource.axd?d=LWW6fbc-QNgTlkHU5BxoAaRpJFqQtUjEwtwY__7e6ybuKMk6YyY32bLlFsnU6wrc1Zdwu7BzoNBF5vuSpbBAmMq6KzPJppllGWFaCVb9EbRdkeE6C884McbzynupfISCWUw4hzaD6WBSvCa8b6rS7Q2&t=ffffffffbd2983fc Line: 5924
Error: The attribute 'onAuthenticated' is an event handler but the supplied value is not a function Source File: http://js.wlxrs.com/~Live.SiteContent.Messenger/~3.50.57270/~/~/~/~/Microsoft.Live.Messenger.UI.Tags.js Line: 1

Regression Range : Works: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b7pre) Gecko/20100917 Firefox/4.0b7pre Fails: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b7pre) Gecko/20100918 Firefox/4.0b7pre Pushlog: http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=268ef4ccb5ff&tochange=fc8d8dfee20f
